Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: WB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, South Chicago, 92nd, Anthony & 87th, due to police activity near 87th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, South Chicago, 92nd, Anthony, then resume their normal route on 87th; due to police activity near 87th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near Kostner/21st Pl.
ShortDescription: WB 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Pulaski, 16th, Kostner & Cermak; due to street blockage near Kostner/21st Pl.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, then resume their normal route on Cermak; due to street blockage near Kostner/21st Pl.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/91st
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to police activity near Ashland/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to police activity near Ashland/91st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
